mapper.select: select m.id,m.name text,m.parentid,m.iconcls iconCls,m.url attributes from t_sys_user_role t left join t_sys_role_menu rm on t.roleid=rm.role_id left join t_sys_menu m on rm.menu_id=m.id where m.enable='1' and t.userid=#{0} and m.parentid=#{1} order by m.levelid
select m.id,m.name text,m.parentid,m.iconcls iconCls,m.url attributes from t_sys_menu m where m.parentid=#{id} order by m.levelid
